mapper.select: select student.stuno, student.`name`, student.age, student.sex, student.phone, student.qq, student.wechat, student.idcard, student.college, student.collegecode, student.major, student.majorcode, student.created, student.modified, student.`status`, student.corp, student.`position`, student.starttime, student.endtime, student.teachno, teacher.`name` as teachname, teacher.age as teachage, teacher.sex as teachsex, teacher.college as teachcollege from student left join teacher on student.teachno=teacher.teachno where stuno = #{stuno}
mapper.update:
update student
student.qq = #{stu.qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student.position = #{stu.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student.age = #{stu.age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student.wechat = #{stu.wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student.phone = #{stu.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student.starttime = #{stu.starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
student.endtime = #{stu.endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
student.teachno = #{stu.teachno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where student.stuno = #{stu.stuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
